item.title: New European border control system for non-EU travelers to launch this October
item.description: The EES will use biometric data to register the visits of non-European Union travelers.

item.title: American Airlines to begin providing pajamas for business-class flyers
item.description: Starting in August, unisex pajamas will be available on all American Airlines wide-body flights departing from certain U.S. airports.

item.description: You can earn Southwest Rapid Rewards points on flights, credit card spending, hotel bookings and more. Here's how to earn Southwest points.

item.title: Deal alert: Points and miles travel deals for August 2025
